entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 09:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of drizzle this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 late in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016
